short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Injects Miniflux search results into search pages like Google and Duckduckgo, SearXNG, Brave Search, Kagi Search

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- When searching on a search engine the search term is also sent to your Miniflux instance and results are added in a new box in the sidebar right to the search engine results.
- Supports google and duckduckgo search engines
- Automatic light or dark theme detection
- Open search result in Miniflux
